Package com.samsung.android.sdk.health.sensor

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ShealthDeviceFinder.ScanListener
    This listener interface receives scan status events.
    ShealthDeviceFinder.ServiceConnectionListener
    This listener interface receives service connection and disconnection events.
    ShealthSensorDevice.DataListener
    This listener interface receives sensor device data.
    ShealthSensorDevice.EventListener
    This listener interface receives joining and leaving status events and command response events.
    ShealthSensorDevice.Exercise.FitnessLevel  
    ShealthSensorDevice.Stress.STATE  
    ShealthSensorDevice.Type  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ShealthDeviceFinder
    This class provides an easy to use interface to the Health Sensor Service.
    ShealthSensorDevice
    This class provides the functionality to maintain device information.
    ShealthSensorDevice.BloodGlucose
    This class contains blood glucose data.
    ShealthSensorDevice.BloodPressure
    This class contains blood pressure data.
    ShealthSensorDevice.BodyTemperature
    This class contains body temperature data.
    ShealthSensorDevice.Coaching
    Class to send measure data for coaching
    ShealthSensorDevice.CoachingResult
    Class to send measure data for coaching result
    ShealthSensorDevice.Command
    Class to send commands to sensor device.
    ShealthSensorDevice.Electrocardiogram
    Class to send measure data for electrocardiogram.
    ShealthSensorDevice.Exercise
    This class contains exercise data.
    ShealthSensorDevice.Fitness
    This class contains fitness data.
    ShealthSensorDevice.Health
    representative Class to send measure data from sensor
    ShealthSensorDevice.HeartRateMonitor
    Class to send measure data for heart rate.
    ShealthSensorDevice.HeartRateMonitor.HeartRateRawData  
    ShealthSensorDevice.Humidity
    Class to send measure data for Humidity.
    ShealthSensorDevice.Location
    Creates an ShealthSensorDevice.Location instance.
    ShealthSensorDevice.Location.Extra  
    ShealthSensorDevice.Pedometer
    Class to send measure data for pedometer.
    ShealthSensorDevice.Profile
    Class to send measure data for Profile
    ShealthSensorDevice.PulseOximeter
    Class to send measure data for pulse oximeter.
    ShealthSensorDevice.Response
    This class contains the response from the sensor, and is returned in the request() method or in the onResponseReceived() callback.
    ShealthSensorDevice.Sleep
    Class to send measure data for sleep
    ShealthSensorDevice.Stress
    Class to send measure data for stress
    ShealthSensorDevice.Temperature
    Class to send measure data for Temperature.
    ShealthSensorDevice.Weight
    Class to send measure data for weight.
